front.title: •Grimtaash
front.gametext: USED: If opponent has 13 or more cards in hand, place all but 8 (random selection) in Used Pile.  LOST: Cancel Molator (even at a holosite). OR Use 4 Force to reveal opponent's hand. All cards opponent has two or more of in hand are lost.
front.lore: Dejarik representation of mythical Molator guardian. The spirit of Grimtaash is said to protect Alderaanian royalty from corruption and betrayal.

combo: Grimtaash + BG-J38 Adds 2 to the destiny of each of your holograms and dejariks drawn for battle destiny or weapon destiny.
rulings: The Used function still has its result even if the opponent plays any response(s) that reduces their hand size below 13 cards.
